# dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

```yaml
---
version: '1.1'
var:
  description: a first variable
  regexp: ^#(?:[0-9a-f]{3}){1,2}$
  default: '#a1a1a1'
  test:
    - '#b1b1b1'
    - '#b2b2b2'
```
